content: lion brand pattern # 40486 *chs-shadesofblue pdf* skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 4 colors 11 balls total *colonial barrington windsor williamsburg* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm special stitch bobble work in pattern alternating 2 row of each color until approximately 50 127 cm long crochet edging to finish
